resources.string:
Verse 
You'll be safe in my romance, babe 
Label's fading 
But I see you cravin' for more 
You're denying it 
But you ain't controlling your actions 
Keep me guessing 
But don't keep me waiting for us 
 
Chorus 
Take all the love that I give 
All that I wish is for you to take me 
But I taste the lies on your lips 
I count the days when we're in love 
'Cuz I only matter when he's not around 
Oh but I live to appreciate you 
So take all the love that I give 
 
Verse 
Got my heart on my sleeve 
I'm beggin' the heavens to be good to me 
Are you obsessive love? 
'Cuz I'm tolerating all of your desires 
I'll keep you wanting me more oh 
Leave but I'll keep you comin' 
I'm sure it's my love that got you suffocated 
 
Chorus 
Oh I live to appreciate you 
Take all the love that I give 
All that I wish is for you to take me 
But I taste the lies on your lips 
I count the days when we're in love 
'Cuz I only matter when he's not around Oh but I live to appreciate you So take all the love that I give 
 
Bridge 
take all the love that I give 
 
Outro 
You come over but not too often 
You don't visit 'cuz you got more options 
You come over but not too often 
You don't visit 'cuz you got more options 

https://open.spotify.com/track/2v6jmF6VQWS96x6tSg05IC?si=NVUIMeFISL6lMw43TKDzRg
